phrases: You protected me from that nuisance, Rohan.
I am telling you that you have the wrong number.
I guess I will head to work so I can make
But first, do you mind if I give you a goodbye kiss?
I never know what you are thinking!
If I say anything about him to anyone,
they will be blown away, and the morning will reset.
If we just keep letting him do what he wants,
it might not happen now, but he will eventually kill me and my mom.
There was someone other than Kira who had abilities.
I have to do something about Rohan Kishibe.
The only one who can save me and my mom and defeat Kira
is someone with abilities like Rohan Kishibe!
If I meet Rohan, he will be blown away and die...
And then I will repeat the same morning again.
I have to tell Rohan about him without meeting him.
I am going to change fate!
You must not read any further.
It is Rohan's ability that he used one me the last morning!
I was hiding from Rohan this time!
Rohan did not even see me!
Once fate has happened, it cannot be changed...
Ugh, the forecast did not say it was going to rain!
You seem to be under the impression that you purposely broke the teapot,
Whatever broke last morning will break again, no matter what.
It will happen because it is meant to be.
If you were turned into a book last morning,
you will turn into a book, no matter what.
This is why Deadly Queen Bites the Dust is invincible.
It erases my identity and returns everything else to what it was.
That means I get to observe Rohan exploding before I head to work.
At 8:27 AM, lightning struck above the Pepsi sign.
He has no idea why he is dying right now.
I wonder if he is thinking about how he will not be able to draw his manga anymore.
Hayato, the very fact that you met Rohan will disappear,
and the morning will continue on.
If I undo Bites the Dust right now,
Rohan's death will just become fact and not repeat again...
But for now, I will not undo it.
A few of his friends should also be showing up, after all.
You are going to automatically defeat them for me, as well.
But Bites the Dust will not because you any harm,
so you should relax and enjoy your fun life as a young boy.
Well, I have to head to the station.
It is because he met me...
Rohan Kishibe was killed because he met me!
Cannot I do anything to defeat him?
Do you know what time it is?
My watch does not seem to be working right.
Have not I seen you somewhere before?
Do you know who I am?
I guess I was imagining it.
They were supposed to meet up!
He left the car door wide open and the key in the ignition.
They probably have the same abilities...
Th-They also came to ask me about Yoshikage Kira.
If they find out that I am Hayato Kawajiri
and ask me about my dad...
I overslept and was late meeting up with my friends.
What, so Rohan's the only one who is not here yet?
When he said his friends were going to show up...
We will not know where Hayato Kawajiri's house is if he is not here.
He must have been talking about them!
I just remembered I accidentally grabbed onto this.
I am sure I have seen him before...
I know I have seen him...
Look at the name on his backpack.
D-Does this have to do with Rohan-sensei not being here?
If these four start asking me about my dad...
They are all going to be blown away!
Do not ask me any questions...
If you guys die, too, who is going to defeat him?
Even if I have to deceive them...
I cannot let these people die, no matter what!
I want to ask you about this photo...
I want to know why you were recording a video in this photo.
Why were you recording your da
I need to go to the clinic!
You do not need to go to a clinic.
He is a relative of mine, Jotaro Kujo.
The one with the scary face over there is Okuyasu Nijimura.
And the friendly-looking guy there is Koichi Hirose.
You go to Budogaoka Elementary, do not you?
Then you will not be late just yet.
If it is nothing, then that is fine.
Do not ask me any questions!
You cannot ask me any questions!
Is the person in this picture
Now they are going to ask even more questions.
What do you mean by Do not say anymore?
What are we not supposed to say?
Are you talking about your dad?
They are all going to explode!
But we did not ask you anything yet.
that even asking you a question is a bad idea?
I-If I die, no one else will have to die!
Since I am the bomb, I just need to die!
If I die, I am sure these people will be able to defeat him and save my mom!
Come on, ask him about Kosaku Kawajiri already.
What are you crouching down for?
For some reason, the box cutter will not go into my throat!
I would never forget it after seeing it once!
its Deadly Queen's third bomb, Bites the Dust.
It is already too late to attack.
If you are seeing me, that means I am already inside your eyes.
It does not matter how many of you there are, because all at once...
You tried to find out my identity!
I am glad you replied for once when I called you, but there is no need to yell.
Breakfast is ready, so come on.
No matter how hard I try,
in an hour, fate is going to eliminate those four, too...
My dying would be troublesome to him,
so Bites the Dust must be automatically protecting me.
Yoshikage Kira is too much of a monster.
Either he has to die, or he has to undo Bites the Dust for whatever reason,
or those four are going to die for sure.
Either he has to die, or he has to undo Bites the Dust...
I always thought there was no way I could ever kill someone.
There was no way an 11-year-old boy like me could kill a monster like that.
A way for an 11-year-old like me to kill him...
And it is sleeping quietly in the dark attic like a gun resting in an armory.
For the first time in my life, I was praying to God from the bottom of my heart.
Lord, please let me kill this man somehow.
This cat-like plant starts moving when sunlight hits it,
and then attacks by shooting air bullets.
And even with just this little bit of light in the room, it is so destructive.
and attack him with an air bullet at point blank range.
But when and how am I supposed to do that?
I cannot do it in or near the house.
He will come to put the hat on my head.
That will be point blank range!
My chance will be when he comes into range behind me.
That is when I have to do it!
We are on the air already?
Dad was saying that he wanted another cup of coffee.
No, you have got the wrong number.
This is not the Sakurai residence.
Here is your fresh cup of coffee.
I guess it would not hurt to have another cup before I go to work.
Fate does not change with Bites the Dust, right?
Something that is been destroyed once will be destroyed, no matter how much I fight it.
You said that, did not you?
All right, Mom, I am heading to school!
I will be there for you.
I will protect you forever, Mom!
I really never have any idea what he is thinking...
Maybe he is not so bad after all.
There is nothing we can do now that it is broken.
More importantly, did you get burnt?
He should have already been here by now...
Ugh, the forecast did not say it was going to rain!
Did fate change because I left the house before him?
If he is coming to put the hat on my head,
he should definitely come up from behind me.
There are still two minutes left!
There is more than two minutes before Rohan Kishibe is automatically blown away.
I need to believe in fate
H-He is already by that tree...
It is just a hunch, but something was strange...
It appears that we have repeated this morning
But there is no more time!
I will just have to attack him from here.
D-Did he figure out that I have the cat plant,
and that is why he is not coming near me?
He is too close if he knows that.
But I have to completely defeat him in one shot.
If I miss, Rohan will explode, and then he will undo Bites the Dust
after the other four are eliminated.
If that happens, he is going to win!
Just one more step to the left!
If he just steps out from behind that filthy tree,
H-He is hidden himself even more!
The look in Hayato's eyes when he left the house...
It is the same look that the loathsome Koichi Hirose and shitbag Josuke have.
My hunch is telling me to carefully observe him...
Though there really is not much that Hayato can do...
Once it is a few seconds past 8:29, the attack on Rohan Kishibe will start!
Those eyes look like a despaired mouse drowning in a cesspool.
I guess I was just imagining his determination.
Those are definitely the eyes of a loser.
I came to bring the hat you forgot, Hayato.
If there is a God, I thank you!
I thank the fate that got this murderer to move from behind that tree!
I feel a fighting spirit burning within me!
I guess he must have taken a different route to school.
This is the end, you murderer!
With my nails growing so quickly...
I got to thinking about how unlucky I have been lately.
It seems like, since last night, luck is coming around to my side.
Remember when Mom's precious tea cup broke this morning?
When the coffee spilled onto my wrist, I was burned,
so I removed my watch and put it in my chest pocket.
If that coffee had not spilled this morning...
